subject: Re: [junit] Getting assertion comments output when using TextRunner
msgSnippet: ... That s probably the most succinct description of Fit/FitNesse I ve seen to date (the home page is *very* vague). T.
messageBody:
On Aug 2, 2004, at 7:51 PM, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

>
> You need to change Assert to do what you're proposing with JUnit.
>
> An alternative is to use Fit/FitNesse for this testing. In case you're
> not familiar with it, Fit operates on test data in tables, so that you
> always see input, expected output, surrounding prose and test results.
> The results show actual output only when it differs from expected
> output.
>
That's probably the most succinct description of Fit/FitNesse I've seen
to date (the home page is *very* vague).

T.
